titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the deduction limitation which applies to State legislators who reside within 50 miles of the capitol building of the State.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/16/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the limitation on travel expense deductions applicable to State legislators who reside within 50 miles of their State capitol.
